data.title: B2B marketplace Auto Hauler Exchange secures $5 million to expand
data.description: AHX says its platform, which supports over 5,000 carriers and more than 350 shippers, eliminates the need for intermediaries, allowing carriers to select shipments while shippers set their prices.

data.title: Ciranda launches ecommerce platform for B2B food ingredient buyers
data.description: The platform provides access to ingredient information, order placement, documentation, and other account management functions.

data.title: Shein to make $15 million compliance investment following cotton questions in London
data.description: Labor and cotton sourcing at Shein and its vendors remained in question as the retailer continued to pursue a path to going public.

data.title: Poshmark introduces generative AI tool for its product listings
data.description: Smart List AI is intended to make listings faster and easier for Poshmark sellers, the marketplace said.

data.title: Portland Kettle Works expands ecommerce for liquid processing systems
data.description: The companyâ€™s expanded online offerings include standardized and customizable 304 and 316 stainless steel mixing and storage tanks, as well as industrial mixers
